Winter Reading Club Skokie Public Library Get started

New
Things
In
2016

December 18 through February 29, 2016

For this year’s Winter Reading program, we’re challenging ourselves to try new things, and stretch for that better version of you.

Learn how you can sign up, level up, and win prizes this winter.

Sign up

It’s easy to get started. Just come to the library or visit the Bookmobile to sign up. You’ll get a level card and can get started.

Only Skokie cardholders and children attending Skokie schools can sign up for this year’s program.

Level up

To complete the program, you have to “level up.” How do you do that? Complete five of the ten tasks on your level card and bring it back to the library.

Finish one level to complete the program.

Feeling ambitious? We've got two more levels for you. So, why not go big and do all three?

Win prizes

Finished your level card? Bring it back to the library and drop it off at the library. You can enter your card in one of several raffle drawing buckets.

Thanks to our sponsors (see below) we have fun prizes to offer like: [PRIZES]

  • British Swim School
  • Illinois Holocaust Musuem & Education Center
  • North Branch Yoga
